basics.name: Ricardo Alves
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer & Solutions Architect
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer and Solutions Architect with 11+ years of experience designing scalable backend architectures, event-driven microservices, and high-performance real-time systems across Payments, POS, Hospitality, IoT, and Computer Vision. Specialized in .NET (Core, 6, 8, 9), C#, C++, Azure, AWS, RabbitMQ clustering, and modern frontends (React, MUI, Tailwind). Known for deep debugging expertise, cloud-native architectures, distributed systems reliability, and delivering mission-critical software used internationally. Recognized for innovative AR/Computer Vision work showcased globally.

location.address: Rua António Viegas Calçada, Bloco Alegria nº3

work.position: Senior Full Stack Engineer & Solutions Architect
work.summary: Architect and lead engineer developing payment, POS, and real-time hospitality systems using .NET 8/9, Azure cloud services, React/MUI, and distributed RabbitMQ clusters. Responsible for backend and frontend architecture, high-availability microservices, deep debugging, and redesigning cloud-native components for performance and scalability.
highlights: Architected new .NET 8 microservices using Clean Architecture and high testability principles
Optimized RabbitMQ cluster behavior under node failures, eliminating message publishing delays
Developed real-time React/MUI frontends for POS interactions with sub-second UI responsiveness
Migrated and re-architected legacy components into Azure-native solutions (Functions, Queues, Storage)
Implemented distributed tracing, observability, and advanced diagnostics across services
Led design of integration layers for payment terminals, delivery platforms, and fiscal systems

work.summary: Engineered large-scale payment and POS systems for restaurants and hotels. Designed microservices, high-performance APIs, React/MUI frontends, and integrations for delivery platforms, payment terminals, and invoicing systems. Improved reliability and performance across RabbitMQ clusters and distributed systems.
highlights: Diagnosed and solved RabbitMQ cluster latency issues under node outages, improving system resilience
Built highly available REST APIs and MVC applications serving major hospitality chains
Implemented modern React/MUI interfaces, custom inputs, advanced forms, and date range components
Developed AWS S3 integration pipelines and Azure Storage processing flows
Implemented Hangfire-based job orchestration for scheduled and high-volume tasks
Designed reusable base configuration system for multi-environment deployments

work.summary: Developed booking, pricing, and integration services for hotel distribution systems. Improved API performance and reliability while contributing to Angular/AngularJS frontends in a distributed architecture.

Delivered full-stack applications and IoT systems using C++, C#, Golang, Typescript, Angular, and OpenCV. Built high-performance device integrations and real-time processing solutions for global clients.
Built ASP.NET Web API, MVC, and AngularJS applications, and developed C++/OpenCV modules for Computer Vision products.
Developed real-time passenger information systems for metro/rail networks. Integrated onboard distributed systems for the Doha Metro with strict latency and reliability requirements.
Developed interactive holographic and AR systems using C++, C#, and Computer Vision. Published internationally and featured in multiple R&D showcases.
